name: cripplingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes serious problems or harm: cripplingly shy I may have appeared confident but in fact, I was cripplingly shy. The food is average and cripplingly overpriced. Osteoarthritis is a cripplingly painful disease.
More examplesFewer examplesThe flight was cripplingly expensive.Many adolescents are cripplingly self-conscious.She loves her new job, but I don't know how she deals with those cripplingly early starts.Despite the midday sun, when I dived in the sea, the water was cripplingly cold.
